channel.title: Best/Easiest client and source to code?
channel.description: im looking to make a server that i can put online and make a webclient for what client and source do you think would be best/easiest for me this will be my first time making a rsps.

item.title: Best/Easiest client and source to code?
item.dc:creator: @mr_arrows95 bansil
item.description:
@mr_arrows95 wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:6, topic:478282”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=596479.msg4200475#msg4200475 date=1358119728]
Read up on java, and start with whatever you want.

Imo, it doesn’t matter where you start. I started off with notepad and ddsspeced (delta), and look where I am now?
[/quote]

so you got worse?[/quote]

DO HO HO.

Read full topic

item.title: Best/Easiest client and source to code?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:478282”][quote author=darkshot04 link=topic=596479.msg4199848#msg4199848 date=1358030066]
im looking to make a server that i can put online and make a webclient for what client and source do you think would be best/easiest for me this will be my first time making a rsps.
[/quote]

The idea isn’t to get the easiest. Which would be a PI.[/quote]

I doubt P.I. is the easiest, seeing as how It’s actually Packaged. The ‘easiest’ would probably be a Base that follows the very basics of Syntax and doesn’t move beyond that.

Read full topic
item.source: Best/Easiest client and source to code?

item.title: Best/Easiest client and source to code?
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:478282”][quote author=darkshot04 link=topic=596479.msg4199848#msg4199848 date=1358030066]
im looking to make a server that i can put online and make a webclient for what client and source do you think would be best/easiest for me this will be my first time making a rsps.
[/quote]
The idea isn’t to get the easiest. Which would be a PI. The idea is to get one that teaches you the right way to program.[/quote]It wouldn’t be a PI, also he’s right about the “right way to program” some how, but you could start with a winterLove server base, and then move on in other things a little more advanced such as runeSource or Solace even maybe hyperion wich i wouldn’t recommend because its SO complex.

Read full topic
item.source: Best/Easiest client and source to code?

@sk8rdude461 wrote:

darkshot04:

im looking to make a server that i can put online and make a webclient for what client and source do you think would be best/easiest for me this will be my first time making a rsps.

The idea isn’t to get the easiest. Which would be a PI. The idea is to get one that teaches you the right way to program.
